ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُخْرَجِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Lut, if you do not desist you will be expelled.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They said: "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will be expelled (from the city)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "O Lot! If you do not desist, you will be one of those expelled (from our towns)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "Lot, if you do not give up preaching, you will certainly be expelled (from this town)".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “O Lut, if you do not desist, you will be expelled.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "If you cease not, O Lut, verily, you will be one of those who are driven out!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: If you desist not, O Lut! you shall surely be of those who are expelled.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'If thou givest not over, Lot, thou shalt assuredly be one of the expelled.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: If thou cease not, O Lot, thou wilt soon be of the outcast.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "If you do not desist, Lot, you will surely be banished."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: if thou desistest not, O Lut! thou shalt surely be of those driven forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Lot, if you do not desist, you will surely be banished.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "If thou desist not, O Lut! thou wilt assuredly be cast out!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "If you cease not. O Lout (Lot)! Verily, you will be one of those who are driven out!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Lot' they replied, 'if you do not desist, you shall be thrown out'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Unless you refrain, O Lot, you will be expelled.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "If you do not desist, O Lot, you will surely be of those evicted."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:167] They said, ‘If you do not desist, O Lot, from reproaching us, you will assuredly be of those expelled’, from our land.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: If thou cease not, Lot) from what you say, (thou wilt soon be of the outcast) you will be expelled from our land, Sodom.
